ComicInfo.Summary:
*BORAG THUNGG, EARTHLETS – Prog 2215 is OUT NOW!* As 2021 finds the planet still in the clutches of the pandemic with many of you facing yet another tough lockdown, our script and art-bots have been working tirelessly to provide you loyal Squaxx with a moment of respite in the form of these zarjaz Thrills.
From everybody’s favourite lawman, Judge Dredd, to the eye-watering spectacle of Leonardo Manco’s glorious art on Sláine, the Command Module can barely contain the amount of circuit-scorching power found within the galaxy’s greatest SF anthology!
Cover: Mark Montague
